resources.string: "A third-year student at Nijigasaki High School. Her looks and proportions go beyond the norm for high-schoolers, and she's submitted photos to fashion magazines. Despite her grown-up looks, she can be surprisingly pure and innocent"

Hallo Minasan! Aplikasi ini adalah aplikasi untuk menampilkan list dan detail character dari anime Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. Semua list character bersumber dari website fandom https://love-live.fandom.com.
